page.title: 06Recreational facilities
page.content: Recreation facilities are generally adequate. At Derwent Park spectators can watch First Division Slalom Lager {Rugby League}(relegated to the Second Division in 1985). At Oldside the newly reclaimed waste ground has been converted into a {caravan park, mini golf course and {horse riding area.} A{Sailing Club}is to be found in the South Dock area. The plans for the Slag Bank reclamation area propose a number of recreational facilities, including an artificial{ski slope. There are numerous{childrens' {facilities}in Vulcans Park. The West Cumbria College offer a variety of{recreational courses}and children can also attend the{cubs, {brownies, guides, scouts, a boys' club {and the sea cadets.
